title: Eric Trump Believes Bitcoin Will Reach $1 Million; Prediction Markets Say Otherwise

body.raw: Eric Trump, son of President Donald Trump, said he believes bitcoin will surpass $1 million and is extremely bullish on the cryptocurrencyâ€™s future. Prediction markets put the probability of that happening in 2025 at under 1%. Eric Trump Believes Bitcoin Will Reach Well Over $1M
